original_text: And as ye would that men should do to you, do ye also to them likewise.
korean_text: 남에게 대접을 받고자 하는 대로 너희도 남을 대접하라

sentences.original_text: And as ye would that men should do to you
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너희가 사람들이 너희에게 해주기를 바라는 것처럼

sentences.original_text: do ye also to them likewise
